org.smartregister.clientandeventmodel

Class FormAttributeParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smartregister.clientandeventmodel.FormAttributeParser

  • public class FormAttributeParser
extends java.lang.Object
    The class is the bridge that allows parsing and mapping of formSubmission fields with those defined in xls form for external system entity mappings.

    • Constructor Summary
